00036     public function runAction( $action )
00037     {
00038         $this->pushAction( $this->getAction() );
00039 
00040         $this->setAction( $action );
00041 
00042         if ( $this->beforeAction( $action ) )
00043         {
00044             $this->dispatchRequest( $action );
00045             $this->afterAction( $action );
00046         }
00047 
00048         $this->setAction( $this->popAction() );
00049     }

00059     public function createAction( $sActionId )
00060     {
00061         $_actionId = ( $sActionId === '' ) ? $this->defaultAction : $sActionId;
00062 
00063         //  Is it a valid request?
00064         if ( ! method_exists( $this, 'get' . $_actionId ) && ! method_exists( $this, 'post' . $_actionId ) && ! method_exists( $this, 'request' . $_actionId ) )
00065             return $this->missingAction( $_actionId );
00066 
00067         return new CPSRESTAction( $this, $_actionId );
00068     }

00075     public function arrayToJSON( $arData = array() )
00076     {
00077         $_arOut = array();
00078 
00079         foreach ( $arData as $_key => &$_value )
00080             $_arOut[] = $_key . ':' . $this->toJSON( $_value );
00081 
00082         return '{' . implode( ',', $_arOut ) . '}';
00083     }

00085     /***
00086      * Converts an item to JSON
00087      *
00088      * @param mixed $oValue
00089      */
00090     function toJSON( $oValue )
00091     {
00092         if ( is_array( $oValue ) )
00093             $_oOut = $this->arrayToJSON( $oValue );
00094         else if ( is_string( $oValue ) )
00095             $_oOut = '"' . addslashes( $oValue ) . '"';
00096         else if ( is_bool( $oValue ) )
00097             $_oOut = $oValue ? 'true' : 'false';
00098         else if ( is_null( $oValue ) )
00099             $_oOut = '""';
00100         else
00101             $_oOut = $oValue;
00102 
00103         return $_oOut;
00104     }

00120     protected function dispatchRequest( CAction $action )
00121     {
00122         $_actionId = $action->getId();
00123         $_parameters = $_REQUEST;
00124         $_urlParameters = array();
00125         $_options = array();
00126 
00127         //  If additional parameters are specified in the URL, convert to parameters...
00128         $_uri = PS::_gr()->getRequestUri();
00129         $_frag = '/' . $this->getId() . '/' . $_actionId;
00130 
00131         if ( null != ( $_uri = trim( substr( $_uri, stripos( $_uri, $_frag ) + strlen( $_frag ) ), ' /?' ) ) )
00132         {
00133             $_options = ( ! empty( $_uri ) ? explode( '/', $_uri ) : array() );
00134 
00135             foreach ( $_options as $_key => $_value )
00136             {
00137                 if ( false !== strpos( $_value, '=' ) )
00138                 {
00139                     if ( null != ( $_list = explode( '=', $_value ) ) )
00140                         $_options[ $_list[0] ] = $_list[1];
00141 
00142                     unset( $_options[ $_key ] );
00143                 }
00144                 else
00145                     $_options[ $_key ] = $_value;
00146             }
00147         }
00148 
00149         //  Any query string? (?x=y&...)
00150         if ( null != ( $_queryString = parse_url( $_uri, PHP_URL_QUERY ) ) )
00151         {
00152             $_queryOptions = array();
00153             parse_str( $_queryString, $_queryOptions );
00154             $_options = array_merge( $_queryOptions, $_options );
00155 
00156             //  Remove route
00157             if ( isset( $_options['r'] ) )
00158                 unset( $_options['r']);
00159         }
00160 
00161         //  load into url params
00162         foreach ( $_options as $_key => $_value )
00163         {
00164             if ( ! isset( $_urlParameters[ $_key ] ) )
00165                 $_urlParameters[ $_key ] = $_value;
00166         }
00167 
00168         //  Is it a valid request?
00169         $_requestType = strtolower( $this->getRequest()->getRequestType() );
00170         $_requestMethod = $_requestType . ucfirst( $_actionId );
00171 
00172         if ( $_requestType == 'post' )
00173         {
00174             foreach ( $_POST as $_key => $_value )
00175             {
00176                 if ( ! is_array( $_value ) )
00177                     $_urlParameters[ $_key ] = $_value;
00178                 else
00179                 {
00180                     foreach ( $_value as $_subKey => $_subValue )
00181                         $_urlParameters[ $_subKey ] = $_subValue;
00182                 }
00183             }
00184         }
00185 
00186         if ( ! method_exists( $this, $_requestMethod ) )
00187         {
00188             //  Is it a valid catchall request?
00189             if ( ! method_exists( $this, 'request' . $_actionId ) )
00190                 //  No clue what it is, so must be bogus. Hand off to missing action...
00191                 return $this->missingAction( $_actionId );
00192 
00193             $_requestMethod = 'request' . $_actionId;
00194         }
00195 
00196 //      CPSLog::trace( __METHOD__, 'calling ' . $_requestMethod . ' with params: ' . PHP_EOL . print_r( $_urlParameters, true ) );
00197 
00198         echo call_user_func_array( array( $this, $_requestMethod ), array_values( $_urlParameters ) );
00199     }

00211     protected function _createResponse( $resultList = array(), $isError = false, $errorMessage = 'failure', $errorCode = 0 )
00212     {
00213         if ( $isError )
00214         {
00215             $_response = array(
00216                 'result' => 'failure',
00217                 'errorMessage' => $errorMessage,
00218                 'errorCode' => $errorCode,
00219             );
00220 
00221             if ( $resultList )
00222                 $_response['resultData'] = $resultList;
00223         }
00224         else
00225         {
00226             $_response = array(
00227                 'result' => 'success',
00228             );
00229 
00230             if ( $resultList )
00231                 $_response['resultData'] = $resultList;
00232         }
00233 
00234         return json_encode( $_response );
00235     }

00237     /***
00238      * Translates errors from normal model attribute names to REST map names
00239      * @param CActiveRecord $model
00240      * @return array
00241      */
00242     protected function _translateErrors( CActiveRecord $model )
00243     {
00244         if ( $_errorList = $model->getErrors() )
00245         {
00246             if ( method_exists( $model, 'attributeRestMap' ) )
00247             {
00248                 $_restMap = $model->attributeRestMap();
00249                 $_resultList = array();
00250 
00251                 foreach ( $_errorList as $_key => $_value )
00252                 {
00253                     if ( in_array( $_key, array_keys( $_restMap ) ) )
00254                         $_resultList[ $_restMap[ $_key ] ] = $_value;
00255                 }
00256 
00257                 $_errorList = $_resultList;
00258             }
00259         }
00260 
00261         return $_errorList;
00262     }
